intervention_catalogue.name: iHorizon
intervention_catalogue.short_description: iHorizon is for men convicted of an internet-only sexual or sexually motivated offence, who are medium risk or above. It helps address problematic factors and how they contribute to behaviour.
intervention_catalogue.long_description: iHorizon is for men convicted of an internet-only sexual or sexually motivated offence, who are medium risk or above. It helps address problematic factors and how they contribute to behaviour.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: 3 x one-to-one sessions and 23 x group sessions

possible_outcomes: assist participant to desist from crime

risk_consideration.osp_score_guide: Medium, high or very high OSP (OASys Sexual Reconviction Predictor)
